resources:
PDF Creator Please enter title. It always starts with: Edit image Crop image yyyy-MM-dd_[your Title] You must grant \"Access Storage Permission\" to save pdf files. After that you should completely close the app or restart the phone. If you don\'t permit the storage access but want to use the screenshot function at a later time, you can grant the permission later. Please open then: system settings - apps - weather. In the permissions section you can grant the \"write storage permission\". Share PDF Open PDF Open app folder Settings Share PDF with: Image to PDF Text to PDF + image + text | ... Write or paste text Which pages do you want to keep? OK Cancel PDF successfully created. An error occurred while creating PDF. Open? Please install a PDF reader. Please install a file manager. No image to load. Please wait. Saving image. Choose from gallery (JPEG) Choose from gallery (PNG) Take photo Cancel Contrast Hue Brightness Sharpness Saturation Exposure Highlight Shadow White Balance Color Balance Levels Min (Mid Adjust) About the app License The app is completely open source and licensed under GPL3. //License Dialog Copyright Â© 2016 by Gaukler Faun For more informations visit the project site on github:
https://github.com/scoute-dich/Weather
